listings.name: Feel Education - Good Morning India (Art)
listings.shortdes: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
listings.fulldes: Despite the considerable progress on education access and participation over the past years, 262 million children and youth aged 6 to 17 were still out of school in 2017, and more than half of children and adolescents are not meeting minimum proficiency standards in reading and mathematics. Good Morning Bangalore aims to educate children and adults alike on various subjects, mainly English and Mathematics, using various unconventional methods from sessions and to consistent weekly evaluation Despite the considerable progress on education access and participation over the past years, 262 million children and youth aged 6 to 17 were still out of school in 2017, and more than half of children and adolescents are not meeting minimum proficiency standards in reading and mathematics. Good Morning Bangalore aims to educate children and adults alike on various subjects, mainly English and Mathematics, using various unconventional methods from sessions and to consistent weekly evaluation
